text: Resident Evil is a 2002 science fiction action horror movie directed by Paul W.S. Anderson and based on the Resident Evil video game franchise. It starred Milla Jovovich and Michelle Rodriguez. ==Cast== *Milla Jovovich as Alice *Michelle Rodriguez as Rain Ocampo ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:2002 horror movies Category:2002 action movies Category:Resident Evil movies Category:2000s apocalyptic movies Category:British horror movies Category:German horror movies Category:Movies set in the United States Category:Movies directed by Paul W.S. Anderson
title: Resident Evil (2002 movie)
